title: Someone please help ASAP
body: So yesterday I was just playing league like any normal night, I messaged a friend of mine and asked to duo in a ranked game. Everything in the game was fine until the 1:20 mark when all of a sudden my game was freaking out on itself. The only thing I could see were health bars. The rest I saw were lines going all over the place. Now, when I open my league client I see black dots all over my screen as if I was missing pixels. I've tried to repair my client 3 times now,  I have also uninstalled and redownloaded LoL and still no luck. If someone knows how I can fix this, that would be great.

replies.body: Based on the context here, it sounds like you might be having some serious video card failure.  You can give our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide a shot, specifically to update any potentially corrupt or outdated drivers.  If that fails, then you might have a bad piece of hardware on your hands.  Let me know if updating drivers help!
